items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress with great stretch
items.body: I received so many compliments on this dress. I bought for a black tie wedding and it worked perfectly. Great stretch and fit. It’s definitely meant for heels or a tall girl because it is long. I am 5’2” and wore with heels and the back dragged like a train which honestly was cute. The front is open so I didn’t step on the dress any. Read more
items.author: Angela Thomas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Dress
items.body: Loved the dress and just my style. The material was comfortable and it wasn’t too tight. It was worth the money i spent. Read more
items.author: Teresa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the $40!!
items.body: **I did wear this while 8 months pregnant! Bought an XL to accommodate the bump, and honestly could have gotten away with a large! But, I loved this dress. Very comfortable. It kind of has a bit of versatility to it that you could absolutely dress up to be more formal, or dress down for a more semi-formal approach. (I wore it as a maid of honor dress!) The style is very nice, and the slit is not too high. There was no strange smell, which does sometimes happen, but not with this one! It is on the thinner side, so I’d suggest wearing nipple covers or a strapless bra. I’m 5’7 and wore 4inch heels with it, and it was the perfect length! But overall, amazing quality for $40!! Read more
items.author: Kalaya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth y
items.body: Amazing soft dress ! Looks just like the picture ! I my issue is that I’m super short ( 5,1) and I constantly had to keep holding the end of the dress! Other than that it was great and I received a lot of compliments. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dirty used dress
items.body: Lovely dress but the item I received was used and filthy. There was a safety pin holding the back together, stains all over the bust of the dress and it smelled of stale perfume and body odor. Absolutely disgusting! The style was lovely but obviously unwearable. Read more
items.author: C. Koberg

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: The dress has a feeling of elegance, Perfect fit true to size will purchase from the company again. Read more
items.author: joann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: I loved this dress. Great fit and conforms to the body! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but not best material
items.body: The initial fit was great and the fabric felt soft but the fabric kept riding up and the slit would get too high. Read more
items.author: Regina Sudu

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi High Split Evening One Shoulder Split Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi High Split Evening One Shoulder Split Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Purple, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
